description: Bytescout BarCode Generator SDK for .NET, ASP.NET, SSRS, ActiveX/COM
releaseNotes:
Bytescout BarCode Generator SDK for .NET, ASP.NET, SSRS, ActiveX/COM

ByteScout, Inc. (c) 2008-2020

Compatibility: .NET Framework 2.0 or later; .NET Core 2.0 or later.
Works with: .NET, ASP.NET, SSRS, ActiveX, Visual Basic 6, Classic ASP, Delphi and others.

Benefits:

- The SDK includes five components: non-visual class (ActiveX/COM compatible), WinForms control, ASP.NET Web control, WPF control, SSRS control.
- Non-visual class able generate barcodes as bitmap or image file; 
- Supports 1D barcodes: Code 39, Code 39 Extended, ISBN, Codabar, Interleaved 2 of 5 (ITF-14), Code 93, Code 128, EAN-8, EAN-13, EAN-14, EAN-128, JAN-13, GTIN-8, GTIN-12, GTIN-13, GTIN-14, InteligentMail, Bookland, UPC-A, UPC-E, POSTNET, PLANET, Numly, GS1-128, USPS Sack Label, USPS Tray Label, SwissPost Parcel, PZN, Optical Product, Deutsche Post Leitcode, Deutsche Post Identcode, Royal Mail, Singapore Postal Code, Dutch KIX, MSI, Plessy, Telepen, GS1 DataBar Omnidirectional, GS1 DataBar Stacked, GS1 DataBar Omnidirectional, GS1 DataBar Truncated;
- Supports 2D barcodes: QR Code, Aztec, DataMatrix; GS1 DataMatrix, PDF417, Truncated PDF417, Micro PDF417, Macro PDF417, MaxiCode; 
- Built-in barcode value validation;
- SSRS (SQL Server Reporting Services) control included;
- Visual Basic 6 compatible (can be used as ActiveX object from VB6 code for image generation, printing and HDC drawing);
- Allows to tune the barcode appearance: font, font size, foreground and background colors, dimensions;
- Able to insert generated barcode image into PDF documents and multi-page TIFF images;
- Both vertical and horizontal image output are supported;
- Supports PNG, JPEG, TIFF, BMP, GIF, EMF output image formats;
- Optional source code licensing is available;
- And much more...

History of changes: 

6.1.0.1105 (March 11, 2020)
+ Added 'CaptionAlignment' and 'AdditionalCaptionAlignment' properties to API and demo application.
= Minor improvements and bugfixes.

6.0.0.1099 (February 11, 2020)
+ Added support for configuration profiles.
+ Added 'ValueComposer' class that helps to create barcode values for vCard, e-mail, and SMS messages that should be correctly handled by mobile barcode readers.
+ Added 'Barcode.Options.EANDrawQuietZoneIndicator' property to enable quiet zone indicator for EAN-2 and EAN-5 barcodes.
+ Added property 'Barcode.Options.PDF417ExtendedFileID'.
- Fixed .NET Core compatibility issue.
= Minor improvements and bugfixes.

5.1.5.1078 (December 4, 2019)
= Improved handling of PDF documents.
= Minor improvements and bugfixes.

5.1.4.1073 (November 1, 2019)
= Minor improvements and bugfixes.

5.1.3.1063 (October 1, 2019)
= Minor improvements and bugfixes.

5.1.2.1061 (September 2, 2019)
= Minor improvements and bugfixes.

5.1.1.1054 (August 6, 2019)
= Improved handling of PDF documents.
= Minor improvements and bugfixes.

5.1.0.1050 (July 1, 2019)
= Improved handling of PDF documents.
= Minor improvements and bugfixes.

5.0.0.1048 (May 22, 2019)
+ Added .NET Core compatible assembly.
= WinForms control moved to separate assembly.
= Improved compatibility with strict environments like Microsoft Azure.
- Minor bugfixes.

4.92.0.1036 (March 12, 2019)
- Improved generation of DataMatrix with multi-byte text encoding.
= Improved handling of PDF documents.
= Minor improvements and bugfixes.

4.91.0.1025 (January 31, 2019)
= DataMatrix encoder now automatically switches to binary mode on multi-byte text encodings.
= Improved handling of PDF documents.
= Other minor improvements and bug fixes.

4.90.0.1008 (October 22, 2018)
+ Added "PharmaCode" barcode symbology.
- Fixed barcode placement in cropped PDF documents.
= Other minor improvements and bug fixes.

4.80.0.993 (July 18, 2018)
+ Added GS1 QR Code symbology.
- Fixed SetCustomCaptionGap() method for EAN-13 symbology.
- Fixed crash when generating MaxiCode.

4.70.0.981 (April 09, 2018)
+ Added `AddDecorationImage` method allowing to paint an image inside of QR Code.
- Codabar: Fixed invalid symbol "-" for Modulo9 checksum 0.
= Minor improvements and bug fixes.

4.63.0.971 (January 22, 2018)
= Disabled ">" mark (quiet zone indicator) on EAN barcodes since it is optional.
- Fixed rare crash on GS1 application identifiers.
= Minor improvements and bug fixes.

4.62.0.964 (November 8, 2017)
- Fixed crash on generation of MaxiCode mode 2 and 3.
- DrawQuietZones property was not exposed to ActiveX/COM.
= Minor improvements and bug fixes.

...
